mil5.2.1:1.4_0: ‘ākaṅkhamāno, ānanda, saṅgho mamaccayena khuddānukhuddakāni sikkhāpadāni samūhanatū’ti.
mil5.2.1:1.5_4: yaṁ bhagavā attano accayena khuddānukhuddakāni sikkhāpadāni samūhanāpeti?
mil5.2.1:1.7_4: saṅgho mamaccayena khuddānukhuddakāni sikkhāpadāni samūhanatū’ti yaṁ vacanaṁ,
mil5.2.1:1.9_1: saṅgho mamaccayena khuddānukhuddakāni sikkhāpadāni samūhanatū’ti tena hi ‘abhiññāyāhaṁ,
mil5.2.1:1.9_3: dhammaṁ desemi no anabhiññāyā’ti tampi vacanaṁ micchā.
mil5.2.1:1.10_0: Ayampi ubhato koṭiko pañho sukhumo nipuṇo gambhīro sugambhīro dunnijjhāpayo,
mil5.2.1:2.2_1: saṅgho mamaccayena khuddānukhuddakāni sikkhāpadāni samūhanatū’ti, taṁ pana, mahārāja,
mil5.2.1:2.3_0: ‘ukkalessanti nu kho mama sāvakā mayā vissajjāpīyamānā mamaccayena khuddānukhuddakāni sikkhāpadāni,
mil5.2.1:3.1_1: cakkavattī rājā putte evaṁ vadeyya ‘ayaṁ kho, tātā,
mil5.2.1:3.2_1: kumārā pituaccayena hatthagate janapade sabbe te paccante paccante dese muñceyyun”ti?
mil5.2.1:3.3_1: luddhatarā kumārā rajjalobhena taduttariṁ diguṇatiguṇaṁ janapadaṁ pariggaṇheyyuṁ,
mil5.2.1:3.3_2: kiṁ pana te hatthagataṁ janapadaṁ muñceyyun”ti?
mil5.2.1:3.4_0: “Evameva kho, mahārāja, tathāgato bhikkhū vīmaṁsamāno evamāha—
mil5.2.1:3.5_0: ‘ākaṅkhamāno, ānanda, saṅgho mamaccayena khuddānukhuddakāni sikkhāpadāni samūhanatū’ti.
mil5.2.1:3.6_1: buddhaputtā dhammalobhena aññampi uttariṁ diyaḍḍhasikkhāpadasataṁ gopeyyuṁ,
mil5.2.1:4.2_0: ‘khuddānukhuddakāni sikkhāpadānī’ti, etthāyaṁ jano sammūḷho vimatijāto adhikato saṁsayapakkhando.
mil5.2.1:4.3_0: Katamāni tāni khuddakāni sikkhāpadāni, katamāni anukhuddakāni sikkhāpadānī”ti?
mil5.2.1:4.4_6: tehipi ekajjhaṁ na kato dhammasaṇṭhitipariyāye bhagavatā eso pañho upadiṭṭho”ti.
mil5.2.1:4.5_0: “Ciranikkhittaṁ, bhante nāgasena, jinarahassaṁ ajjetarahi loke vivaṭaṁ pākaṭaṁ katan”ti.
